heading: Services & Pricing

items.title: 1:1 In-Person (50 min)
items.desc: Personalized coaching for your goals: conversation, meetings, presentation practice near Magome.

items.title: 1:1 Online (40 min)
items.desc: Focused sessions for busy schedules. Improve speaking confidence and business email & meeting language.

items.title: 1:1 Online (25 min)
items.desc: Short, consistent practice. Perfect for daily speaking reps and vocabulary refresh.

items.title: Group (in-person, 60 min, up to 8)
items.desc: A friendly conversation group with light correction and useful business topics.
items.note: Pilot class: ask about schedule & venue (Magome/Ota-ku).

policy: Bookings and cancellations require 24-hour notice. Payment via PayPay / bank transfer / cash.
corpHint: For company training or team workshops, please contact me directly (pricing varies).
